snippet: Chevron and Exxon Mobil had some of the biggest gains in the Dow Jones industrial average, which ended a seven-session losing streak.
abstract: Stocks experience best day of trading in three months, spurred on by resurgent energy sector and Berkshire Hathaway's decision to purchase Precision Castparts.
lead_paragraph: Chevron and Exxon Mobil had some of the biggest gains in the Dow Jones industrial average, which ended a seven-session losing streak.

headline.main: Wall St. Climbs as the Price of Oil Rebounds
headline.print_headline: Market Rebounds as Oil Prices Rise
